original_title: Funeral Macaco – Do anguerenguê ao proto-punk
overview: From underground music venues to poetry events, the documentary film tells the story of the band Funeral Macaco recording their first album, that blend elements such as hypnotic Brazilian percussions along with the beatitude of noise present in psychedelic and punk rock genres. A register of what's going on outside the mainstream in Rio de Janeiro.
title: Funeral Macaco – From aguerenguê to proto-punk
